SEARCH
Package Characters

Class Cyborg

java.lang.Object
Characters.GameCharacter
Characters.Cyborg
public class Cyborg extends GameCharacter
Cyborg is a class that represents a cyborg character in the game. It extends the Character class and has methods to move the cyborg, collect rewards, hit traps, contact with monsters, and get the score.

    • hitTrap

      public void hitTrap()
      Hits a trap and decreases the cyborg's score.

    • contactWithMonster

      public void contactWithMonster()
      Contacts with a monster and handles the interaction based on the cyborg's state. If the cyborg does not have protective cover or invincibility, the score is reset to 0. If the cyborg has invincibility, it will destroy the monster and lose invincibility. If the cyborg has a protective cover, it will protect the cyborg and the cover will be used up.

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Returns the score of the cyborg.
      Returns:
      The score of the cyborg.

    • hasProtectiveCover

      public boolean hasProtectiveCover()
      Returns whether the cyborg has a protective cover.
      Returns:
      True if the cyborg has a protective cover, false otherwise.

    • isInvincible

      public boolean isInvincible()
      Returns whether the cyborg is invincible.
      Returns:
      True if the cyborg is invincible, false otherwise.

    • decreaseScore

      public void decreaseScore()
      Decreases the score of the cyborg by 1.

    • increaseScore

      public void increaseScore()
      Increases the score of the cyborg by 1.
